item_desc1EN.	\t\tA yellow-colored crystal said to contain the power of the sun. If you hold it up to the light, the interior seems to undulate like a contained atmosphere.\n#~Vernis Mineralogical Field Guide~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tA yellow ore crystal.
item_desc1EN.	\t\tA yellow-colored crystal said to contain the power of the sun. If you hold it up to the light, the interior seems to undulate like a contained atmosphere.\n#~Vernis Mineralogical Field Guide~\n
